meanings.definition: A fabric with a crosswise ribbed effect.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful bengaline dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The curtains were made of shiny bengaline material.
meanings.sent3: The bengaline fabric whispered as it moved, like a secret being shared.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a bengaline quality, smooth and textured at the same time.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight caught the bengaline threads, creating a shimmering effect.

meanings.definition: To make or finish with bengaline fabric.
meanings.sent1: She decided to bengaline the edges of the tablecloth for a fancy touch.
meanings.sent2: The tailor bengalined the gown to give it a polished look.
meanings.sent3: He bengalined the curtains with precision, turning them into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The artist bengalined the painting, adding depth and texture to the colors.
meanings.sent5: The chef bengalined the cake with delicate icing, making it look elegant.
